item.name: Height
item.description: The control's height when rendered. The height is specified using CSS syntax. If the *[ui:Fill container]* property is checked, this property is hidden.

item.name: Width
item.description: The control's width when rendered. The width is specified using CSS syntax. If the *[ui:Fill container]* property is checked, this property is hidden.

item.name: Fill container
item.description: If checked, the control will fill the container.

item.name: Control properties
item.description: Properties for configuring the control. Depending on the type of control, the configuration options will be different. See *[About Control properties]* below for more information.

description.p: The 'Control properties' property loads different settings depending on the type of Custom Control that is being edited. The [CustomControl], [StepIndicator], [StarRating], [AudioPlayer], [AudioRecorderAndPlayer], [IntegerValue], [VideoPlayer], and [VideoRecorderPlayer] controls all make use of the 'Control properties' property. These controls can be added from the Data Controls *[ui:More...]* option.
